What position should you take?

The shaking has stopped. What now?
Run outside
Duck and cover
Hide under the desk
Squat down

Trying to move once an earthquake has started is dangerous. You should stay where you currently are.
Always try to hide under something sturdy first to stop objects from falling onto your head
Nice job! Hiding under something sturdy, such as a table or desk, is the best way to keep safe
Always cover your head and neck because they are the most important parts of your body
Good choice, but holding onto the furniture is also important to steady yourself
Correct! This allows you to protect and steady yourself
Great choice! You should always stay still until the shaking has stopped
You should not try to move during an earthquake as it can result in more harm
Staying where you are is the safest option during an earthquake
After the shaking has stopped, it is good to move to safety and regroup with your family
Nice! Since the shaking has stopped, it is a great time to exit the house
Even though the earthquake is over, you should still be cautious especially since there is damage everywhere
